title: RILSYSTEMSELECTIONPREFSROAMINGMODE (rilapitypes.h)
description: Don't use the RILSYSTEMSELECTIONPREFSROAMINGMODE enumeration in your code. Microsoft reserves the enumeration for internal use only.
